alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 17 at 11:43PM AKST until January 19 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Downtown Juneau and Douglas. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects and may damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lulls in the winds are possible, but higher winds aloft will continue to make their way down to the surface through Thursday.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
